snippet: The Simon Property Group is in preliminary talks with the Blackstone Group about making a potential joint bid for the bankrupt mall operator after it rejected Simon’s offer, a person briefed on the matter told DealBook.
lead_paragraph: 7:50 p.m. | Updated The Simon Property Group is in preliminary talks with the Blackstone Group and sovereign wealth funds about making a potential joint bid for General Growth Properties after the bankrupt mall operator rejected Simon’s unsolicited $10 billion offer, people briefed on the matter told DealBook on Thursday.

headline.main: Simon Seeks Partners for Joint General Growth Bid

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
